subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Heather O’Reilly scored in the 72nd minute and the United States women’s team beat South Korea, 1-0, in an exhibition match in Tampa, Fla. The United States improved to 31-1-2 this year. The previous American high for victories in a year (28) was set in 2004.
